mapper.update: update eb_article_category set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intr = #{intr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hidden = #{hidden,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pid, title, intr, image, status, sort, is_del, add_time, hidden, ctime from eb_article_category
